name: Hall Monitor
description:
Certify hall passes and monitor the halls for suspicious children.

Tips:

"left" = deny

"right" = accept

Accepted hallpasses should follow the rules as outlined in your notes. You will find these ingame once you start.

Avoid ringing the alarm multiple times. You will be penalized for doing so.

Avoid making errors in your hallpass judgement. You will be penalized for doing so.
